1.name: Sector 1 Reactor
1.desc: Cloud just joined Avalanche. With Barret, the leader, they planned to destroy a MAKO reator which depletes the energy of the Planet.

2.name: Sector 5 Reactor
2.desc: After succesfully destroyed one reactor, Avalanche planned to destroy another one. Tifa joined the group to help.

3.name: Sector 6
3.desc: It was a trap! Avalanche has successfully destroy the reactor. However, Cloud was separated and woke up in a church, meeting Aerith.

4.name: Sector 7
4.desc: With the help of Aerith, Cloud found his friends, fighting the SHINRA who wants to bomb the sector 7. Aerith left to warn the residents.

5.name: Shinra Headquarters (part 1)
5.desc: Aerith is the last Ancient and has been kidnapped! Cloud, Barret and Tifa went to SHINRA HQ to rescue her. Red XIII, a mysterious animal, provided assistance.
